metadata.comments: Solution template for Cyfirma Digital Risk

metadata.description: Not used, but needed to pass arm-ttk test `Location-Should-Not-Be-Hardcoded`.  We instead use the `workspace-location` which is derived from the LA workspace
[concat('Region to deploy solution resources -- separate from location selection',parameters('location'))]
Workspace name for Log Analytics where Microsoft Sentinel is setup
resource group name where Microsoft Sentinel is setup
subscription id where Microsoft Sentinel is setup

connectorUiConfig.title: Cyfirma Digital Risk Connector
connectorUiConfig.descriptionMarkdown: The [Cyfirma DeCYFIR/DeTCT Alerts] data connector enables seamless log ingestion from the DeCYFIR/DeTCT API into Microsoft Sentinel. Built on the Microsoft Sentinel Codeless Connector Platform, it leverages the DeCYFIR Alerts API to retrieve logs. Additionally, it supports DCR-based [ingestion time transformations](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/logs/custom-logs-overview), which parse security data into a custom table during ingestion. This eliminates the need for query-time parsing, enhancing performance and efficiency.

dataTypes.name: CyfirmaDBWMPhishingAlerts_CL
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
CyfirmaDBWMPhishingAlerts_CL
       | where TimeGenerated > ago(12h)                | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

dataTypes.name: CyfirmaDBWMRansomwareAlerts_CL
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
CyfirmaDBWMRansomwareAlerts_CL
       | where TimeGenerated > ago(12h)                | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

dataFlows.transformKql:
source
| extend TimeGenerated=alert_created_date
| extend alert_title=['title']
| project-away alert_created_date, ['title'], notes

| extend TimeGenerated=alert_created_date
| extend alert_title=['title']
| project-away alert_created_date, ['title'], notes

instructionSteps.title: Cyfirma Digital Risk Connector
instructionSteps.description: Connect to Cyfirma Data Breach And Web Monitoring Alerts Connector

properties.descriptionHtml:
Note: Please refer to the following before installing the solution:

• Review the solution Release Notes

• There may be known issues pertaining to this Solution, please refer to them before installing.

The [Cyfirma Digital Risk] solution integrates with Microsoft Sentinel to provide real-time intelligence on data exposures across dark web forums, ransomware groups, public sources, and code repositories. It enables organizations to detect leaked credentials, internal documents, source code, and PII/CIIs that could be exploited by threat actors. Enriched intelligence is ingested into Microsoft Sentinel, helping security teams correlate external threats with internal activity, detect compromised accounts, and automate incident response.

Data Connectors: 1

Learn more about Microsoft Sentinel | Learn more about Solutions
